name: Mr. Grips Gripping on Inflammatory Objects and Disturbs Monsters
name_original: Mr. Grips Gripping on Inflammatory Objects and Disturbs Monsters
description:
A very rudimentary VR shooter game made for a school project. Only putting here for showcasing, I wouldn't recommend playing it, performance is really bad. Maybe watch the 'trailer' of it.

Credits:

Okan Ataç - Blueprint Developer, Game Designer

Emre Avcı - Level Designer

Mete Fuzuli Şimşekol - Artist, Animator
